pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Throughput Phenotyping with EHR using a Common Automated Pipeline // Implement surrogate-assisted feature extraction (SAFE) and common machine learning approaches to train and validate phenotyping models. Background and details about the methods can be found at Zhang et al. (2019) doi:10.1038/s41596-019-0227-6, Yu et al. (2017) doi:10.1093/jamia/ocw135, and Liao et al. (2015) doi:10.1136/bmj.h1885.
